trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Easton
There were no other sightings in Easton on or around November 30th 1988
Summary: oval shaped abnormality with multicolored lights
divs: Sighting DetailsI was 3, and I was going to bed, when I looked out the window, and saw it. Ifirst noticed the object because it had stood out really badly against the nightsky. I thought it was a UFO. Oh my gosh I think would be my reaction. Itstarted moving slowly upwards, then it moved downwards toward the ground, thenlanded for about a minute, then took off. It looked like a saucer with a bubbleon top of it and covered in brightly colored window panes, each a differentcolor. I lost sight of the object when I ran downstairs to get my father. Bythe time I got back, it was gone, and my father did not believe me.
